title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.14 - Changes to licensee's fee structure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.14 - Changes to licensee's fee structure

State Regulations

Any modification of the licensee's fee structure for
debtors shall require that the licensee notify the superintendent in writing of
the proposed change(s) at least 30 calendar days prior to implementation. The
superintendent shall review the fee structure taking into consideration the
expenses of the operation, the financial status of the debtor(s) and such other
factors as the superintendent shall deem relevant. The licensee may implement
the modified fee structure unless the superintendent disapproves of the
change(s) in writing within 30 days of notification of the proposed change(s)
unless such time period is extended in writing by the
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
402.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
